holidays.title: Belarus Constitution Day
holidays.description: Celebrate Belarus’ achievement in crossing over from a Soviet satellite state to a fully independent democracy.

holidays.title: Brutus Day
holidays.description: Brutus Day is coming up this March. What can you do to avoid having backstabbing friends?

holidays.title: Buzzards Day
holidays.description: Buzzards are scavengers and are the only ones of their kind that don't kill their prey.

holidays.title: Dumbstruck Day
holidays.description: Get ready for fun activities and amazing facts that'll leave you dumbstruck!

holidays.title: Everything You Think Is Wrong Day
holidays.description: Today’s a good day to remember that you aren’t always right! Learn more with us!

holidays.title: Honen Matsuri
holidays.description: The phallus is a symbol of fertility, good health, and good luck in Honen Matsuri.

holidays.title: International Day Against Police Brutality
holidays.description: Police brutality kills thousands of people worldwide every year. Join us as we investigate.

holidays.title: International Day of Action Against Canadian Seal Slaughter
holidays.description: Help save baby seals and assist in raising awareness to finally ban commercial seal slaughter!

holidays.title: International Day to Combat Islamophobia
holidays.description: Ready to find out more about this day that stands against discrimination toward Muslims?

holidays.title: International Eat an Animal for PETA Day
holidays.description: Let’s discuss EATAPETA and the organization it criticizes while we engage in some ethical meat-eating.

holidays.title: International Redefining Wealth Day
holidays.description: Take a fresh look at your relationship with money and whether it is a priority.

holidays.title: J.J. Roberts Birthday
holidays.description: Learn about Liberia’s founding father and how he achieved sovereignty for his nation and people.

holidays.title: Memorial Day Of The 1848 Revolution
holidays.description: Learn about Hungary's most significant holiday and why it defines its national identity.

holidays.title: National Day of Action Against Bullying and Violence
holidays.description: Let’s all prepare to join forces to create long-term solutions to bullying!

holidays.title: National Peanut Lovers Day
holidays.description: Join us today as we celebrate the love of peanuts and all nutty treats!

holidays.title: National Preschool Teacher Appreciation Day
holidays.description: It's time to honor the preschool teachers who provide us with the tools of learning.

holidays.title: National Preschool Teachers Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Check out some inspiring ways to show preschool educators your admiration for them!

holidays.title: National Shoe The World Day
holidays.description: Let’s provide shoes to help someone in need this National Shoe The World Day!

holidays.title: National VO Day
holidays.description: Did you know that voice acting is more difficult than acting on screen?

holidays.title: Pears Helene Day
holidays.description: Get your spoons ready, dessert fanatics; we’re treating our palettes to Pears Helene!

holidays.title: Ramakrishna Jayanti
holidays.description: Ramakrishna believed that all the various religious paths lead to one goal.

holidays.title: True Confessions Day
holidays.description: Confessions are good for the soul. Spill your secrets and unburden yourself on True Confessions Day.

holidays.title: World Consumer Rights Day
holidays.description: Today, we’re discovering the real power of consumers and our consumer rights!

holidays.title: World Contact Day
holidays.description: Who better to ask about alien life than aliens? So, let’s just contact them!

holidays.title: World Essential Workers Day
holidays.description: Essential workers consist of police forces, healthcare workers, workers in the sanitary department, and more.

holidays.title: World Sleep Day
holidays.description: Sleep allows us to move mountains that we never thought possible before we hit the pillow.

holidays.title: World Speech Day
holidays.description: This World Speech Day, get on stage, grab a mic, and give wings to your words.

holidays.title: Alia Bhatt’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented actress has been a rising star in Hindi-language cinema for the last decade.

holidays.title: Eva Longoria’s Birthday
holidays.description: She's done it all, from modeling to acting to designing and releasing a book!

holidays.title: I Hate Everything’s Birthday
holidays.description: Enjoyed by over a million subscribers, he is a great critic on a number of topics.

holidays.title: Ruth Bader Ginsburg’s Birthday
holidays.description: An activist for equality, Ginsburg was unstoppable, becoming a role model to many.

holidays.title: Saint Nicholas’s Birthday
holidays.description: Strong in his faith, generosity, and kindness, Saint Nicholas became a religious role model to many!

holidays.title: will.i.am’s Birthday
holidays.description: will.i.iam, the talented rapper, singer, songwriter, and record producer, has produced several hits.
